name: Cult Adorable [DEMO]
description:
• Kiki is a cult leader, very energetic and loud, loves everything cute and charming. Many consider her strange, but her presence in any company immediately improves the atmosphere.

• Kotoko is Kiki's right-hand man, a former member of a group of delinquents, but after one incident she left the gang and began to hang out with Kiki more, that's how they became friends. She is quite sensible and sweet, but if someone offends a person close to her, she will humiliate and break them completely.  Loves "your mom" jokes.

• Akihiko is a cute guy that Kiki wants to drag into her cult. He is calm, but rather sarcastic. He doesn't talk toо much and he was very impressed that Kiki decided to talk to him.

Content warning:

  • The game has mild swearing.
